name: Tody Epik Art Schoolhouse! [Baldi Fangame]
description:
!WARNING!

This game is lazy, i just made when i was bored, and i kinda proud of it, yeah i know it's not good, but this made me know alot more about unity, it was hard to make it, hope you enjoy :)

Story!
in this game you a student who go to a epic art schoolhouse, but the teacher is kinda strange, he really don't like that people touch his drawnings, so your mission here is get the two drawnings in the room a̶͕̬̬͘͝n̸̯̟̜͂̚d̸͇̗̦̈́̐̌̄͠ ̵̡̦̗͉̤́d̴̟̗̙́͋ȏ̸̢̞̹n̷̥̖̠͉̗̑̋́͝'̸̡̛̞̻̣̤̍t̸͎̰̍ ̷̫̙̫̮̪͌́̔l̸̪̩̦̃͌̄ẹ̸̏͌̍t̵̬͊̂͋ ̷̨͛̉̊̂̿ḩ̶̢̧̞̞̔͂ḛ̶͒̊̌͋ ̴̨̧̭̾͑͒͘̚k̷̄͒̑̕ͅì̵̩͚̀͋̒̏͜ḻ̵͈͝ľ̷̡͉̦̙͔͝ ̶̫̬̹͝ý̵̲̑̉̐͜͝o̴̻̗̖͉͊ů̵̢̘̩̣
